page.title: 19SHOPS IN THE COMMUNITY
page.content: We have approximately 8400 people in our area. To serve our community we have{5 general-food stores}and 2 are {sub-post offices}as well,{2 {hairdressers, 1 fish and chips shop, and{1 bakery.}The general stores found that their busiest times were 9.00 a.m and 4.00 p.m when children are going to and from school. Local shops are very necessary for {all ages}of the community especially {old people}who need sub-post offices for their state pensions. The shops are very handy for a person to buy their weekly shopping or for something they have forgotten or run out of. They are very popular with{children, as the selection of sweets is far greater than in supermarkets. The majority of the community feel that more shops are not needed as they are well catered for.
